Chace Hotel is located near to Coventry Airport and has an on-site restaurant.

The Glengary is located on the A45 in a very convenient location for Coventry Airport. The hotel has an on-site restaurant and operates airport transfers.

A.N.R. Robinson International Airport Airport found

Just a short walk from A.N.R. Robinson International Airport and the beach the 24-room Kariwak provides accommodations overlooking gardens and an outdoor pool. A range of spa treatments is available for those seeking further relaxation.

A 20-room property next to tropical gardens the Shedperd’s Inn is also close to A.N.R. Robinson Airport. All rooms are air-conditioned and the property is a short walk from the beach. Bonkers the hotel’s restaurant offers all-day dining.
Situated along Store Bay Beach and a few minutes from A.N.R. Robinson Airport this mid-range hotel offers a choice of rooms studio apartments and cabins.

column12:
A five minute drive from A.N.R. Robinson International Airport in the village of Bon Accord Native Abode features a number of room options to choose from. Facilities here include a small meeting room and business centre.

Kingston Norman Manley International Airport Airport found

column11: The centrally located Jamaica Pegasus Hotel has a range of facilities including a fitness centre meeting space for up to 1 000 people and a café that's open 24 hours a day. A shuttle bus operates between the hotel and Kingston Norman Manley International Airport for a fee.

In the New Kingston area of the Jamaican capital the 143-room Knutsford Court Hotel houses an on-site restaurant serving local and international dishes. The hotel is also a good option for those on business with meeting space for up to 300 people available for hire.

Montego Bay Sangster International Airport Airport found

Set in 400 acres (162 hectares) of lush gardens and with an enviable beachfront location Half Moon houses a spa numerous swimming pools tennis courts and an 18-hole golf course. There is also a choice of restaurants serving Jamaican and international fare.

The original Sandals resort Sandals Montego Bay is just minutes from Sangster International Airport and boasts a pristine beach fringed by lush vegetation. Facilities here include extensive dining options swimming pools and a range of activities for all ages.

Boasting a water park and a spa among its range of facilities Sunset Beach Resort is located in Montego Bay a short distance from Sangster International Airport.

Varadero Juan Gualberto Gómez Airport Airport found

One of the closest hotels to the airport being just 20km (12 miles) away the 3-star Hotel Oasis boasts a beachfront location and numerous facilities including a large swimming pool a games room and on-site restaurant. Private car rental is also available through the hotel.

column12: The 5-star Iberostar Varadero is located alongside Varadero's beach and offers a range of activities and facilities for all ages. A children's club is available for eight to 12-year-olds while there are also water sports and swimming pools to enjoy. The hotel is 15km (9 miles) from the town and 50km (31 miles) from the airport.

Surrounded by lush gardens and boasting sea views Blau Varadero Hotel is located along the Hicacos Peninsula in Varadero 40km (25 miles) from the airport. Among the hotel's numerous facilities is a diving school massage service and a gift shop. On-site dining is available from the hotel's two restaurants with both buffet and à la carte options available.

Havana José Martí International Airport Airport found

column11: A less expensive option in the city centre Hotel El Bosque offers an outdoor pool meeting facilities a gym and a sauna along with a restaurant and bar. Customers can also access the services of the Hotel Kohly located just down the street. It is located close to the city's Metropolitan Park.

In common with most of the hotels along the Havana coast this is a large upmarket property with all the characteristics of a major resort hotel including extensive gardens an outdoor pool a variety of dining options and conference facilities featuring multipurpose rooms and a business centre.

column12:
A nice option within a short drive of the airport Hotel Memories Miramar is situated a short walk from the beach. Facilities here include two restaurants a poolside bar and meeting facilities for groups of up to 200 people.

Grand Bahama International Airport Airport found

column11: Located centrally in Freeport the Royal Islander has 100 rooms housed in a colonial style building. It offers a poolside bar and restaurant plus easy access to the International Bazaar and local casino which are a five-minute walk away.
Boasting a tennis court gym and spa amongst other facilities Island Seas Resort is located in central Freeport just 5km (3 miles) from Grand Bahama International Airport.

Grand Lucayan Resort is located a short drive from the airport. As well as sea view rooms and a range of dining options the resort offers a golf course and a full-service spa.

Nassau Lynden Pindling International Airport Airport found

The Meliá Nassau Beach hotel is located in Cable Bay which is a short distance from Nassau Lynden Pindling International Airport. As well as outdoor pools and numerous water sports the resort offers Italian Creole and Caribbean fare in its cafés and restaurants.

The closest accommodation to Nassau Lynden Pindling International Airport this is a small development built in a colonial style. It bills itself as a 'bed and breakfast' but its offering is more befitting of a premium boutique hotel complete with a pool gardens and restaurant.

Located in Cable Bay around 5km (3 miles) from Nassau Lynden Pindling International Airport the Sandals Royal Bahamian resort provides all-inclusive luxury accommodation on the beachfront. A range of dining and entertainment options are available and there is an on-site spa.

Hewanorra International Airport Airport found

An all-inclusive resort Coconut Bay Beach Resort caters for adult-only parties and family groups in separate wings. This beachside resort has a choice of pools dining options and a range of activities.

Just minutes from the airport in the town of Vieux Fort Charlery's Inn offers a free shuttle service to Hewanorra International Airport. Accommodation consists of single-bedroom suites and individual rooms and the property is close to the town centre amenities and transport links.

Maurice Bishop International Airport Airport found

Right on the beach this is a good spot if you like aquatic activities and sports – diving instruction is offered to those wishing to learn. The resort also has botanical gardens two restaurants several bars a business centre and a range of conference and meeting rooms.

Set in a stunning beachside location this resort is very close to Maurice Bishop International Airport. Free Wi-Fi is available in certain areas and there is a wide range of dining and sporting options including fishing and diving.

Five minutes' drive from Maurice Bishop International Airport this luxury resort boasts the full range of services associated with this type of accommodation. Spread between three 'villages' are nine restaurants three pools a fitness centre and spa.

V. C. Bird International Airport Airport found

Set amongst luscious gardens on the edge of a white sandy beach Galley Bay Resort and Spa offers accommodation in cottages and beachfront rooms. Hotel facilities include three restaurants a spa and various water sports activities.

The closest luxury accommodation option to the airport Sugar Ridge is a large resort complex on the coast with both a deluxe villa and rooms available. Spas yoga classes pools and evening entertainment are offered along with a wide choice of restaurants.

Located in Dickenson Bay 10km (6 miles) from the airport the large Sandals Grande Antigua Resort & Spa offers a mindboggling choice of 11 restaurants and a good selection of bars. Other facilities here include a wide choice of activities an opulent spa and nightly entertainment.

The best choice for those on a budget the Wind Chimes Inn is less than five minutes from the airport and is also close to restaurants and nightlife – St. John's is 10 minutes away by taxi. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available as well as complimentary breakfast.

Bermuda L. F. Wade International Airport Airport found

The upmarket Grotto Bay Beach Resort is located a short distance from Bermuda L. F. Wade International Airport across the Causeway. The resort offers a range of sports and leisure facilities as well as a spa a choice of dining options and its own private beach.

Located towards the south of the island though still only 20 minutes from the airport the Fourways Inn provides a number of private cottages nestled in a vibrant green garden. The resort also offers an on-site gourmet restaurant and large swimming pool.

This family-orientated apartment complex is located close to the airport and offers basic but well-maintained budget accommodation. The apartments offer free internet access and are all within walking distance of a number of good local eateries. The beach is a short bus ride away.

San Juan Luis Muñoz Marin International Airport Airport found
The 416-room Ritz-Carlton San Juan is located close to the airport along the seafront at Isla Verde. The resort is home to five restaurants a 24-hour casino a wellness spa and a business centre.

The Intercontinental San Juan is located within a 10-minute drive of San Juan Luis Muñoz Marín International Airport. Facilities include a health club business centre and a range of dining and entertainment options.

column1: Courtyard by Marriott Isla Verde Beach Resort
column11: One of the more luxurious options near the airport the 260-room Courtyard Isla Verde Beach Resort is located along the coast within walking distance of the airport. The hotel offers a large range of dining options excursions and easy access to the nearby beach.
San Juan Airport Hotel is conveniently located at the airport. It offers air-conditioned rooms a free hot breakfast and high-speed Wi-Fi. There is also a fitness centre restaurant and meeting rooms.

3.5km (2 miles) from the airport this mid-range hotel has two restaurants meeting rooms an outdoor rooftop pool a gym and a business centre. It's also close to the beach and just a few minutes from central San Juan.

Punta Cana International Airport Airport found

The Puntacana Resort and Club is a top-of-the-range luxury resort complex featuring a choice of deluxe rooms and villas golf courses tennis water sports bars and a spa experience. In addition there is a large selection of restaurants serving Mediterranean International and Caribbean fare.

column1: Four Points by Sheraton Punta Cana Village
column11: Four Points is the closest accommodation to the airport – within walking distance free shuttles are available from Punta Cana International Airport if preferred. Facilities include a business centre an on-site restaurant an outdoor pool and several meeting rooms.

Located within the extensive Punta Cana resort complex this is an upmarket choice offering a range of suites and villas restaurant selections and a deluxe golf experience.

Puerto Plata Gregorio Luperón Airport Airport found

The Casa Marina Beach resort is located about 7km (4 miles) from Puerto Plata Gregorio Luperón International Airport on a semi-private beach with more than 500m (0.5km) of coastline. Amenities include multiple bars restaurants a conference center swimming pools and daily entertainment.

Just 15 minutes from the airport by private car or taxi Puerto Plata Village offers an on-site bar and restaurants Wi-Fi internet access and a swimming pool. The hotel also organises activities and excursions including snorkelling diving lessons and kayaking.

Tropix Hotel is an affordable and stylish attraction within 15 minutes of the airport situated close to Sosúa's beaches. It's compromised of five buildings that are surrounded by private gardens and a pool.

column12: Situated a short distance from Trellis Bay and connected by a regular boat service the resort is one option for those seeking accommodation close to Beef Island Airport. Scrub Island Resort Spa and Marina is a high-end hotel with a wide range of leisure and dining facilities.

column11: This hotel is situated on the hillside of Guana Island close to the airport. A Guana representative will meet you at customs at the airport and accompany you on the 10-minute boat ride to the island. The hotel offers a beautiful escape and for an especially extravagant experience customers can rent the entire island.

Just outside of Road Town on neighbouring Tortola Island Maria’s by the Sea Hotel is a coastal hotel offering sweeping views of the nearby harbour. Facilities here include meeting and event space a good on-site restaurant and a selection of room and suites.

Grantley Adams International Airport Airport found

A little further away from the airport this small beachfront hotel offers 15 apartments and studios a beach bar and restaurant and is set within lush gardens. Activities available include surfing and game fishing.

Situated a short distance to the west of the airport the Butterfly Beach hotel is another waterfront option with a choice of rooms and apartments offering the choice of self-catering or fully-serviced stays.

One of the nearest hotels to the airport the Casa Grand offers free airport and beach shuttle services as well as a swimming pool entertainment options and a choice of bars and eateries. Meeting facilities are available for up to 2 000 delegates.

The 107-room Mercure hotel is located in Saint-Denis a 15-minute drive from Réunion Roland Garros Airport. Among the facilities are seven meeting rooms a restaurant serving Creole and French-influenced food and an outdoor pool.

Guests at the Best Western Le Saint-Denis can cool off in the outdoor pool relax in the cocktail lounge and enjoy French cuisine served up at the on-site L'Oasis restaurant. Situated near the seafront in Saint-Denis the hotel is a 15-minute drive from Réunion Roland Garros Airport.

Halfway between the airport and Saint Denis the Tulip Inn is a mid-range hotel offering meeting facilities a restaurant and bar and an outdoor pool.

Erbil International Airport Airport found

The nearest hotel to the airport is about five minutes away by taxi. It is a luxury facility offering meeting rooms spa and indoor pool along with a choice of two restaurants. Free Wi-Fi is offered and staff members are multilingual.
Located in the centre of town this luxury option includes an indoor pool with sauna and gym a café/restaurant and conference room. Single double family and suite rooms are available.

Also located close to the airport the Seever Hotel is a 4-star offering with a range of rooms and suites available. The hotel also boasts rentable meeting rooms a gymnasium and on-site restaurant. Wi-Fi access is included in the room rate.

Situated in central Al Ain the Al Ain Rotana hotel boasts a good range of dining options leisure facilities and business services. Valet parking is also available.

Dubai International Airport Airport found

This 5-star hotel is split between Terminal 1 and 3 and offers rooms on a nightly and hourly basis. Facilities here include a health club with a swimming pool meeting space and easy access to dining and shopping options in the terminals.

The Holiday Inn Express is a two-minute drive or complimentary shuttle bus ride from Dubai International Airport's Terminal 3. Free undercover parking is available to guests who can make use of the five rooftop meeting rooms fitness centre bar and restaurant.

column12:
Boasting a large choice of on-site dining options from Italian to Mexican cuisines the 115-room Millennium Airport Hotel is a two-minute drive from Dubai International Airport and is close to a range of entertainment options. Inside the hotel guests can enjoy the fitness centre and a beauty salon.

column11: For those seeking a more moderately priced stopover the Park Inn is also located in the Yas Island complex about 10 km (6 miles) from AUH. Facilities include a swimming pool meeting rooms and an adjacent golf course plus various restaurants.
Directly linked to Terminal 1 and 3 via the Skypark shopping complex the Premier Inn has 300 rooms a restaurant and bar plus meeting rooms. Facilities include a swimming pool and gymnasium.

Opulent luxurious and modern the Yas Viceroy is a choice for those who feel a need to spoil themselves. Just a few minutes by cab from the airport and alongside the Formula 1 race circuit this is a truly spectacular hotel.
Also just a short trip by taxi from the airport this international chain hotel offers several restaurants and bars along with meeting facilities a spa and swimming pools.

Integrated within Terminal 1 at Abu Dhabi International Airport Aerotel is available for passengers in transit. Rooms incorporate en-suite showers and the accommodation is fully wheelchair-accessible.

Just a short distance from the airport the Crowne Plaza is adjacent to a golf course and a sandy beach. Several restaurants and bars are available along with extensive meeting facilities a spa outdoor pool and a gym.

Boasting an outdoor pool steam room and a range of dining options Ramada Dammam Hotel and Suites is just five minutes' drive from the airport to which it is linked via a shuttle bus transfer service.

column12: Located within a large business park Novotel Dammam Business Park Hotel is around 25 minutes from the airport. The hotel is a good option for business travellers with its 10 meeting rooms.

The 5-star Sheraton hotel is located in Dammam’s business district and has a wealth of leisure facilities including a pool tennis courts and spa. On-site dining options offer Lebanese Italian and pan-Asian cuisine.

column11: Just seven minutes from the airport by car Habitat Hotel offers suite-only accommodation. Among its on-site facilities is a gym restaurants and a business centre.

With sweeping views of the Red Sea Hilton Jeddah Hotel has a range of leisure facilities including a swimming pool and tennis courts and numerous dining options. Business needs are met with the hotel's business centre and 11 meeting rooms.

The 156-room Elaf Jeddah Hotel is within a short distance of the airport with some rooms overlooking the Red Sea. Those looking to unwind can make use of the extensive health and fitness centre.

column12: This Holiday Inn is located between Riyadh King Khaled International Airport and the city centre just a 20-minute drive from the terminal building. The hotel is a good option for both business and leisure travellers with 26 meeting rooms and two outdoor pools.

column11: Boasting 248 rooms and suites Makarim Riyadh Hotel is located on the airport site. The hotel offers a choice of restaurants extensive meeting and events facilities a business centre and a wide range of sports facilities including tennis courts an outdoor pool gym and sauna.

Set in expansive gardens Riyadh InterContinental Hotel has a range of leisure facilities including a nine-hole golf course bowling alley and tennis courts. The hotel is 30 minutes away from Riyadh King Khaled International Airport.

Located in the architecturally stunning Kingdom Centre the Four Seasons Riyadh is a 30-minute ride from Riyadh King Khaled International Airport via a pre-arranged shuttle bus service. Hotel facilities include a choice of restaurants and a spa.

Located in central Riyadh the Radisson Blu Hotel Riyadh is home to four restaurants serving a mix of local and international fare. The hotel is a good mid-range option for those on business with 12 meeting/event rooms and free Wi-Fi internet access.

column12: Located in Tehran Imam Khomeini International Airport this 5-star hotel features free airport transfer services various meeting and conference rooms and on-site dining options. There are also two separate sections for men and women that include a sauna spa massage service and swimming pool.

Comprised of 196 rooms this 4-star hotel provides inter-airport transfer services (to and from Tehran Imam Khomeini International Airport to Mehr Abad Airport) on-site dining a gym and juice bar.

column11: Just a 15-minute drive from the airport Four Points by Sheraton Le Verdun is a less pricey accommodation option. It features a rooftop pool a gym meeting facilities and a bar.

This hotel is located a five-minute drive away from the airport and offers a variety of room options to guests. Three eateries are available within the hotel and facilities for business events make for perfect conference spaces.
The Golden Plaza is an upmarket hotel close to the airport offering suite-style accommodation and conference facilities. The hotel provides a fitness centre and a full-service restaurant.

This extravagant resort is a 10-minute drive away from the airport and sits on the coast. The hotel’s facilities include meetings and event space an outdoor swimming pool and a number of restaurants.

The closest accommodation to Doha International Airport this luxury hotel has 388 rooms and 12 suites plus a choice of restaurants and bars – including one at the poolside. There is also a jazz club which runs from Monday to Saturday evenings and an extensive leisure and fitness centre.

Also located within the remits of the city's former airport the Crowne Plaza is a modern complex close to the main business area. It has full leisure facilities including a pool and also offers extensive meeting facilities. Several on-site restaurants are available offering food from around the world.

Located just a short drive from the airport and within minutes of the city centre the Oxyx Rotana is a luxury facility with five restaurants an outdoor pool and massage parlour. Meeting rooms for business purposes are also available on-site.

Adjacent to the terminal complex the Airport Hotel offers transfer passengers stays of as little as three hours and has a choice of room types including larger luxury suites. Dining is available along with a 'wellness centre' with pool and gym.

Amman Queen Alia International Airport Airport found

The 304-room Amman Airport Hotel is just 2km (1.4 miles) from Amman Queen Alia International Airport. In addition to a range of eating and drinking venues the 4-star hotel boasts a fitness suite pool meeting rooms and business services. A free shuttle operates to and from the airport.

column12: Located in the city centre (private transport to and from the airport can be arranged) the Four Seasons is a luxury hotel offering a choice of dining spa facilities and both indoor and outdoor pools.

column11:

Located in a new shopping centre this 37-room boutique property offers transfers to and from the airport. Rooms are available on a bed and breakfast basis and include free Wi-Fi access. For meals other than breakfast there are a number of restaurants nearby.

Kuwait International Airport Airport found

Boasting its own private beach Hilton Kuwait City is 30 minutes from Kuwait International Airport by free shuttle bus. Hotel facilities include extensive on-site dining options two swimming pools a fitness centre and a spa.

The opulent Sheraton Kuwait Hotel & Towers is located in Kuwait City's business district. As well as a range of on-site dining options from English afternoon tea to Lebanese cuisine there are various business services and a health club. The hotel shares its outdoor pool with the Four Points by Sheraton Hotel which is located nearby.

The Safir Airport Hotel is located within the airport's restricted zone next to the east part of the runway. It can be reached by courtesy bus but can only be used by transit passengers. Under Kuwaiti air transport law passengers facing a wait of more than eight hours for a connecting flight are entitled to free rooms at the hotel courtesy of the airline.

This boutique hotel is as its name suggests British-owned. It offers a small business centre and airport transfers can be arranged. The hotel is located in the city centre near both the main railway station and Tbilisi's major businesses and attractions.

Nestled into the bank of the Mtkvari River in Tbilisi city centre this luxurious major international chain hotel offers a top floor spa with city views nine meeting rooms for business travellers a bar full service restaurant and an in-house casino.

Situated in the heart of Tbilisi the City Partner Hotel is a 4-star rated property. The hotel's star attraction is its rooftop pool but other facilities include restaurants cafés a gym and a meeting room for up to 50 delegates.

Yangon International Airport Airport found

Also a short drive from the airport the High Five is a slightly cheaper alternative to its luxurious neighbours. The hotel's on-site restaurant serves up a wide range of Southeast Asian cuisine and Wi-Fi internet access is included in the room rate.
Many of the rooms at the Myanmar Life open directly on to the lush gardens that surround the property. Breakfast is included in the room rate as is a complimentary airport shuttle if required.

With 143 suites of varying size the MiCasa is a good family option. There is a restaurant and bar an outdoor pool and a fully equipped fitness centre. Conference and meetings facilities are also available.

There are 30 sleeping pods located on level F1 opposite Gate 3. The service is 24/7.

Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport's official hotel the 460-room Pullman Guangzhou Baiyun Airport is located about five minutes' walk from the terminal. It offers all the amenities one would expect of a large international hotel plus a golf course and other sporting facilities.
10 minutes' drive from the airport the Grand Peak is a large mid-range hotel. It offers three restaurants conference facilities a gymnasium an outdoor pool and a nightclub.

Situated 2km (3 miles) south of the airport complex this hotel offers a complimentary airport shuttle service. On-site amenities include a choice of restaurants an outdoor pool and meeting facilities.

If you want to stay in a good location without spending much consider Ibis. This hotel is surrounded by shopping malls and is only 200-metre from the railway station.

Only a 20-minute drive from the airport and with superb views over Xiamen Bay this 342 hotel is a favourite of western travellers in Xiamen. Its business facilities including 10 meeting rooms are functional and well equipped.

This massive 460-room hotel has three on-site restaurants including a German-themed beer hall two ballrooms six function rooms an indoor pool a wellness centre and spa facilities.

Despite being only 0.5km (0.3 miles) opposite of Terminal 1 this 5-star hotel provides a free shuttle service to the terminal buildings. Only an 8-minute walk from the Airport this massive hotel is popular with transit passengers and many travellers rate it highly. Despite its close proximity to the airport the hotel also provides a free shuttle service.

The 4-star Novotel Atlantis Shanghai hotel is located 5km (3 miles) from Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport. The hotel has a health club spa indoor pool and four on-site restaurants. Meeting space for up to 150 people is available to hire.

Boasting Chinese Japanese and Italian restaurants the Sheraton Shanghai Hongqiao Hotel is a 15-minute drive from Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport. Meeting facilities and fitness services are also available on site.

One of the closest hotels to the terminals this budget option offers remote check-in for flights to Japan and a shuttle transfer to the international terminal as well as extensive business and meeting facilities.

Branding itself as a business hotel the Jin Jiang New Garden Hotel is located close to Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport. The hotel has a range of dining options a beauty salon and meeting space for up to 250 people.

A good option for those on business with its choice of meeting and event facilities the 5-star Shanghai Marriott Hotel Hongqiao is located less than 2km (1.3 miles) from Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport. On-site dining is available in the form of a steakhouse and a café and there is a fitness centre to work off the jet lag.

A budget hotel only a few minutes' drive from the airport the Jinjiang Inn offers basic accommodation at a reasonable price. An on-site restaurant is included in the hotel's amenities along with business facilities free Wi-Fi and an airport shuttle service.
A five-minute shuttle ride from the terminals the Ramada is a large hotel offering a choice of restaurants a health club and spa and numerous meeting and function rooms.

Located some 6 ½ miles (10 km) from Shanghai Pudong International Airport this modern 4-star hotel offers a free airport shuttle service; it also features a fitness centre business centre and two restaurants.

The 440-room Novotel Citygate is located near Hong Kong International Airport a 5 minute drive away via free shuttle bus. Facilities include meeting rooms two restaurants a gym and outdoor pool.

The rooms are large and comfortable decorated with an authentic Thai design and come fully air-conditioned with an en-suite bathroom. This hotel provides free Wi-Fi a 24-hour front desk and valet parking. All rooms have a balcony flat screen TV coffee machine and are equipped with air conditioning.

Pen Ta Hug Hotel is located just a 15-minute drive away from Ubon Ratchathani Airport. This hotel has modern décor with each room containing a vibrant and unique wall painting. The hotel also offers an on-site restaurant business services a 24-hour front desk and free breakfast.
This hotel has 150 elegantly furnished rooms and is a 10-minute drive from Ubon Ratchathani Airport. Among its range of facilities are business services an outdoor swimming pool and a coffee shop.
