A little further away from the airport the 85-room Stegemann Hotel offers an indoor pool sauna solarium and restaurant. It is situated in a quiet location to the north of the airport on Route 475.

The closest accommodation option to the airport; the 3-star LandKomfort Hotel is situated in parklands and incorporates spa facilities a restaurant and uniquely an onsite farm. It is aimed primarily at families but its close proximity to the airport makes it a convenient option for all travellers.

Paderborn/Lippstadt Airport Airport found

Another option reasonably close to the airport is the Feldschlößchen in Geseke which despite its otherwise small size has an events room with space for 200 people. Built in the style of a small castle it dates back to 1909.
This is a small establishment within a five-minute drive of the airport. It does however boast a sizable restaurant serving local food. There is a choice of single and double rooms available.

The only accommodation situated close to the airport the Airport Hotel located opposite the terminal directly behind the parking area offers meeting spaces a restaurant large lounge and a terrace bar. A breakfast buffet is also available and can be accessed as early as 0330 if necessary.

Zweibrücken Airport Airport found

A pretty hotel in the mid to upper price range this rural property is a short distance from Zweibrücken Airport on the northern side of the A8 autobahn. It has some small meeting rooms a swimming pool sauna and two restaurants.

Consisting of 35 modern apartments situated right alongside the Style Outlets Zweibrücken shopping centre this property offers a bar buffet breakfast and discounts for guests at local leisure facilities. Rooms with waterbeds are available at an extra cost.

Rostock-Laage Airport Airport found

One of the nearest hotels to the airport this property is about 5km (3 miles) from the terminal. It offers 22 rooms a restaurant serving regional specialities and has events/meetings space for up to 50 people.
Another small guesthouse close to the airport the Herrenhaus Friedrichshof offers a number of rooms plus space for meetings and events. Prices are moderate and full board is available if required.

Situated in the small town of Laage from which the airport takes its name this is a small guest house offering single and double rooms plus self-catering apartments. It also has a sauna and solarium facility.

City Airport Bremen Airport found

The airport's only on-site hotel the Atlantic is located within a few steps of the terminals. It offers a selection of decent-sized rooms a range of conference and meeting facilities and a restaurant and bar.

Very close to BRE this Holiday Inn Express offers the usual HIE facilities. It has meeting rooms a business centre and a bar offering basic dining options. The surrounding area has plenty of restaurants and the historic city centre is minutes away.

Also relatively close to the airport the Tryp offers 183 rooms along with a bistro restaurant and meeting facilities. The front desk is open 24 hours and the hotel is convenient for visiting attractions in the city centre.

About 10 minutes from City Airport Bremen the Hotel Robben is one of the most popular hotels in the vicinity. A boutique-style hotel guests can choose from traditional or modern rooms and dine in the on-site restaurant which is open for breakfast lunch and dinner.

For those travelling on a limited budget B & L offers modern accommodation at a reasonable price with a choice of room styles. Facilities are basic but clean and there is a good choice of dining options in the locality as well as kitchen facilities on the premises.

Just outside the city centre approximately 10 minutes from the airport this is a good option for business and leisure travellers with its indoor pool restaurants bars and business centre. It's on the number 6 tramline too which runs directly to the airport.

Dresden International Airport Airport found

One of the closest accommodation options to the airport this is a 4-star property with 101 rooms plus conference and meetings spaces. Facilities include a fitness centre with spa and sauna a restaurant and a bar.

A smaller establishment the Kurhaus Klotzsche is a few minutes' drive from the airport. Its restaurant specialises in Saxon cuisine and wines and there is an outside patio area. Free Wi-Fi is provided and a free airport collection service is available.

About 2.2km (1.4 mile) from the airport via car/ taxi this small hotel offers relatively basic accommodation but is suitably well-priced. Room rates include breakfast and Wi-Fi and public transport links are located close by.

Leipzig/Halle Airport Airport found

A short distance to the east of the airport the Ibis Styles reflects the standard offering of this international brand. It has 112 rooms and the restaurant is open from 0600-2300 daily. It has a fitness centre and meeting rooms are available.

The 158-room Globana is a 4-star hotel that offers a gymnasium sauna and restaurant serving traditional and seasonal local food. It is also located near a forest that has various walking and cycling trails. Conference facilities are also available at the hotel.

Located in the heart of the airport campus this small hotel is a short walk from the terminal. It offers a choice of single double and apartment-style rooms. Advertised room rates do not include breakfast.

Nuremberg Airport Airport found
Located adjacent to the terminal the 150-room Mövenpick is a 4-star hotel with gymnasium full-service restaurant and meetings facilities. It is also close to public transport links.

Just three stops by Metro from the airport the new 3-star Acorn Hotel is also convenient for the historic city centre. It has more than 200 rooms a 24-hour bistro/bar one small meeting room and a breakfast restaurant with outdoor terrace.

This 4-star property is approximately 4km (2.5 miles) from the airport and is convenient located for the historic city centre. It has 74 rooms and suites a restaurant specialising in Bavarian cuisine and a meeting room with capacity for up to 35 people.

Housed in an early 18th century building the Hotel Drei Linden is a 3-star property that recently benefitted from a refurbishment. The hotel offers a buffet breakfast and an onsite bar but being in the city centre there are many others bars and restaurants close by.

Located close to the city's castle the Azimut has 118 rooms a summer terrace overlooking the historic quarter and claims that its accommodation is 'unusually spacious'. Some rooms have balconies and others have cooking facilities.

Situated in a quiet area on the north-eastern fringe of the city centre the Cristal is a moderately-priced 3-star hotel with a breakfast room and sauna. It is near the airport's Metro link.

Bodensee Airport Friedrichshafen Airport found
Opened in late 2013 the Comfort Hotel is located within walking distance of the city centre. Its 142 rooms are complemented by a breakfast buffet restaurant/bar and four meeting rooms.

Set on a scenic lakeside about 5km (3.1 miles) from the airport the Best Western features a gourmet restaurant and is close to the local Zeppelin Museum and the city centre. It also has a small meeting room.

For those in search of accommodation with a bit more character Landhaus Vier Jahreszetien on the shore of Lake Constance (Bodensee) is an excellent option. The family-run 17 room guest house boasts large comfortable rooms a traditional restaurant and is just 15 minutes from the airport by cab.

The Ibis Friedrichshafen Airport Messe Hotel is just a short walk from the airport terminal and located within the airport vicinity. Facilities include a restaurant and bar golf course and a tennis court as well as a business centre and meeting rooms.

Sylt (Westerland) Airport Airport found

Located further inland Hotel Jörg Müller is a small hotel with an emphasis on 'wellness' stays. The 22 room hotel includes a gourmet restaurant cosy bistro bar and more modern wine bar as well as a spa offering a range of treatments for total relaxation.

Benefiting from an excellent beachfront location the Dünenberg is a less pricey alternative to the luxurious Hotel Miramar. Like its luxurious neighbour this establishment also offers a restaurant and spa facilities as well as a wine bar and internet access.

Located roughly 2km (1 mile) west of the airport this 5-star property is one of the islands largest and more luxurious accommodation offerings. Dating back to Victorian times the hotel offers a range of rooms and suites and features a gourmet restaurant with summer beachfront terrace.

Frankfurt Airport Airport found

Boasting four restaurants a fitness centre and 40 conference rooms the 550-room Steigenberger Airport Hotel Frankfurt is a short distance from the airport site and is linked by a free shuttle bus service.

column12: The Sheraton couldn’t be closer to the action at Frankfurt Airport with its covered walkway connecting the 1 000-room hotel to Terminal 1. This large hotel also has 60 banqueting/event rooms as well as a range of dining and entertainment options.

column1: Intercity Hotel at Cargo City Süd
column11: The mid-range Intercity Hotel at Cargo City Süd is located near Frankfurt Airport and has a restaurant fitness area and 14 conference rooms. Guests can request free local travel passes and the hotel operates a regular shuttle service (for a fee) to and from the airport.

Located in the Squaire building above the train station the Hilton Garden Inn Frankfurt Airport has direct pedestrian access to Terminal 1. Business and meeting facilities are available to use by those on business while those seeking to relax will enjoy the fitness room and full-service restaurant.

Linked to Terminal 1 by a covered walkway the Hilton Frankfurt Airport offers a 24-hour business centre meeting facilities and a fitness centre. On-site dining is available at a restaurant serving freshly baked bread and buffet lunches as well as at the bistro/lounge bar in the lobby.
Close to Terminal 2 the budget Meininger Hotel Frankfurt Airport provides underground parking and gym. The shuttle which is available for a fee serves the airport but does not stop at Terminal 1.

column12:
The My Cloud Transit Hotel Frankfurt with 59 rooms is so conveniently located in Terminal 1 that its guests don't need to leave the transit zone. It allows transit passengers to book rooms by the hour. Other advantages are that the reception is open round the clock and that the hotel offers free WiFi. 

Berlin-Tegel Airport Airport found

column11: The closest accommodation to the airport the 4-star Mercure offers a shuttle service to and from the terminals. In addition a full-service restaurant gym with outdoor pool and a range of meeting rooms are available for use by guests.

The 70-room Days Inn hotel is about 10 minutes from Berlin-Tegel Airport (by car) and is served by bus 128 from the terminal complex. This 3-star hotel provides Wi-Fi internet access (for a fee) and guest parking. Children under 12 stay free when accompanied by an adult.

A 10 minute drive from the airport 3-star Hotel Larat offers a selection of charming rooms in green surrounds.

Stuttgart Airport Airport found

Stuttgart Airport's only on-site hotel Mövenpick Hotel Stuttgart Messe is within walking distance of the terminal. Geared towards business travellers this hotel boasts a fitness centre with a sauna and solarium an on-site restaurant and conference space.
Boasting its own restaurant bar and summer terrace the Best Western Plazahotel is located a short distance from Stuttgart Airport. A free airport shuttle service is available for guests.

The sleek NH Stuttgart Airport hotel is a 10-minute drive from Stuttgart Airport and offers a complimentary shuttle bus service to/from the terminals. The 4-star hotel features a spa area two restaurants and a range of meeting facilities.

A good option for those looking for easy access to both the airport and the city centre the Mercure is linked to the nearby Stuttgart Airport and exhibition centre by a free shuttle bus service. Guests here can unwind in the sauna and fitness centre and enjoy the on-site restaurant and bar.

Featuring a stylish restaurant this mid-range hotel is a short walk or shuttle ride from the terminal just off the main airport site. Equipped with meeting facilities and places to relax such as a sauna the Wyndham suits business and leisure travellers.

As with other hotels in the vicinity the Holiday Inn Express operates a shuttle bus service to the airport which is conveniently just 3km (2 miles) away. Guests here with cars can make use of on-site parking facilities while those staying on business can hire the hotel's conference rooms.

Being situated in close proximity to the airport the Moxy Stuttgart Airport/Fairground hotel has 176 modern rooms equipped with WiFi and Apple TV-sets. The hotel also offers snacks and drinks around the clock a breakfast bar a Day Bar meeting room and a gym. The city centre of Stuttgart can be reached by car within 15 minutes.

Cologne Bonn Airport Airport found

column1: Airport Hotel by the New Yorker
column11: Offering free parking to guests during their stay and rates for those wishing to park during their trip the Airport Hotel by the New Yorker is located 1.3 km (0.8 miles) from Cologne-Bonn Airport. Meeting facilities are also available for hire from the hotel.

The family-run Hotel Karsten Airport is a short drive from Cologne-Bonn Airport and provides a shuttle service (on request) to/from the terminals. Each of the 24 rooms benefits from free Wi-Fi internet access.

The Leonardo Hotel Cologne Bonn Airport is only 300m away from the terminals. The hotel offers courtesy shuttle services to and from the airport round the clock. The Leonardo Hotel has its own restaurant and is a good option for business travellers with its conference facilities and business centre.

Düsseldorf Airport Airport found

The Sheraton Düsseldorf Airport Hotel is on the roof of the P3 car park at the airport. This conveniently located hotel offers a range of facilities including a 24-hour gym high-speed internet access and a business centre.

Boasting indoor car parking and leisure facilities such as a sauna and fitness centre the 4-star Novotel Düsseldorf City West is 5km (3 miles) from Düsseldorf Airport. Meeting space is available to business guests.

Equipped with spa facilities including a large indoor pool a choice of restaurants and extensive event space the on-site 500-room Maritim Airport Hotel is linked to the terminal via a pedestrian walkway.

Holiday Inn Düsseldorf Airport is located 4km (2.5 miles) from Düsseldorf Airport. A complimentary shuttle bus service runs to/from the terminal building while hotel facilities include a swimming pool garden areas and a 'beach'. For the hungry there is an on-site pub and restaurant.

Also close to Düsseldorf Airport the Lindner offers 202 rooms and suites complemented by conference facilities a bistro restaurant and fitness centre with sauna. The hotel is adjacent to parkland and a free airport shuttle is available.

Hamburg Airport Airport found

The 4-star Leonardo Hotel Hamburg Airport is located 2km (1.2 miles) from Hamburg Airport and is linked via a free shuttle bus service. Hotel facilities include on-site parking a fitness centre and a restaurant.

Located just 600m (1 969ft) from Hamburg Airport’s terminal buildings Courtyard Hamburg Airport is linked to the airport complex via a shuttle service. The hotel has an on-site restaurant fitness centre meeting/event space and free high-speed internet.

Radisson Blu Hamburg Airport is directly linked to the airport terminals providing easy access to a wide range of services. The hotel also has a number of on-site facilities including a restaurant bar and fitness centre.

The recently renovated 37-room Leonardo Hotels property is located very close to the terminals. As with most other accommodation in the vicinity free shuttle transfers are offered to and from the airport and on-site facilities include free Wi-Fi and a breakfast bar.

The Ibis offers 157 rooms each with Wi-Fi internet access. A free shuttle bus links the hotel with the adjacent Hamburg Airport. Reception is open 24 hours a day and the on-site restaurant serves breakfast and dinner.

Munich Airport Airport found

The NH München-Airport 236-room hotel has an on-site restaurant and provides meeting/conference space for up to 300 people. The 4-star hotel is located 2.5km (1.5 miles) from Munich Airport and is linked via a shuttle bus service (for a fee).

A good option for those staying on business with its meeting facilities and location close to a business park the Mövenpick is just a few minutes from the terminals by a regular shuttle bus. It also has a lovely beer garden which is a great place to relax.

Among the on-site options Hotel Novotel Muenchen Airport features a sauna fitness centre parking facilities and conference/meeting space. This mid-range hotel also boasts a restaurant serving lunch and dinner.

Situated between the terminals this hotel was previously known as the Kempinsky and offers large meeting facilities along with a spa 24-hour fitness centre free Wi-Fi in public areas restaurant and direct access to the airport.

Billund Airport Airport found

As its name implies this 4-star hotel is located at the theme park of the same name just minutes from the airport. It too has extensive meetings and conference facilities in addition to its 223 rooms restaurant and bar.

The closest accommodation to the airport Zleep Hotel offers basic budget accommodation just five minutes' walk from the terminal. It has 163 rooms and a breakfast buffet is available for an additional charge.

Close to both Legoland and the airport Hotel Propellen offers meeting rooms and a fully equipped gymnasium. There is a choice of three dining rooms one of which has an outdoor terrace area for use in summer.

The 'Swan' is a very modern boutique style hotel about 3km (2 miles) from the airport. It offers conference facilities a restaurant a bar and lounge. Suites are available along with standard rooms and the hotel is within walking distance of Legoland.

Copenhagen Airport Airport found

Offering dining and fitness facilities as well as free Wi-Fi Internet access Quality Airport Hotel Dan is within 1.9km (1.1 mile) from Copenhagen Airport. This mid-range hotel provides a complimentary shuttle service to and from the airport for its guests. They also offer 4 conference rooms for up to a total of 110 people.

The Park Inn is within 3km (1.9 miles) of Copenhagen Airport is a good option for those on a budget. Those staying here can make use of free car parking a free business centre on-site fitness centre and indoor swimming pool while there is a beach to explore nearby. Additionally there are 23 conference rooms for up to 400 delegates. The hotel is pet-friendly.

The Clarion Hotel is located at the airport with access via a covered walkway from Terminal 3. A range of dining fitness and business facilities – including 29 meeting rooms – are available here for use by guests and non-guests. They also have a ballroom with a 500-person capacity.

Faro Airport Airport found
One of the closest hotels to Faro Airport (3km/2 miles from the terminal) the budget Hotel Ibis Faro offers fairly basic accommodation but features an outdoor pool restaurant and meeting facilities.

The 4-star Hotel Mónaco operates free shuttle services to the airport which is 3km (2 miles) away. As well as a relaxing outdoor pool the whitewashed complex boasts a restaurant/bar and meeting space.

Located just outside the main airport entrance the Hotel 3K Aeroporto De Faro is one of the closest accommodation options to Faro Airport. The 3-star hotel has a 24-hour reception desk a swimming pool and two parking garages. It also serves breakfast.

Madeira Cristiano Ronaldo Airport Airport found

Less than five minutes' drive from Madeira Cristiano Ronaldo Airport the 4-star Vila Galé Santa Cruz is connected to the airport via a transfer service (at an additional cost). Hotel facilities include a spa swimming pools for all ages and dining options. The hotel also boasts a kids’ club.

This intimate 40-room Hotel Santa Catarina is less than two minutes' drive from Madeira Cristiano Ronaldo Airport in Santa Cruz. The hotel houses a bar and restaurant billiard room conference facilities and an outdoor swimming pool. Free internet access is offered to guests.

Lisbon Portela Airport Airport found

This chain property with a boutique feel is around 3km (2 miles) from Lisbon Portela Airport and offers a selection of rooms and suites. The hotel has two function/meeting rooms as well as a gym restaurant and cocktail bar. Free Wi-Fi access is available to guests.

Located close to the Oriente railway station the 4-star Hotel Tivoli Oriente has nearly 300 rooms many of which have excellent views across the Tagus River. The hotel also boasts two on-site restaurants an indoor pool sauna and Turkish bath plus a business centre and meeting facilities.

column12: This hotel is adjacent to Terminal 1 and has 167 rooms. Aside from unbeatable convenience thanks to its location it also boasts a restaurant a conference centre an outdoor pool and a gymnasium.

column11:
The closest hotel to Lisbon Portela Airport the Holiday Inn Express offers a shuttle bus service to and from the airport (at a charge). Other services include a 24-hour business centre and a meeting room with capacity for up to 40 delegates.

Porto Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport Airport found

The Holiday Inn Express provides comfortable accommodation at affordable rates just 8km (5 miles) from the airport. A short distance from the beaches at Leça da Palmeira the hotel houses a business centre and cocktail bar.

column12: A two-minute ride from the airport the OPOHotel Porto Aeroporto is a good base for those requiring an overnight stay at or near the airport. A breakfast buffet airport shuttle service and free Wi-Fi access is also available to guests.

column11:
The new Park Hotel Porto Airport is just a three-minute walk from the terminal building – it is also close to metro stations and a number of restaurants. Meeting rooms are available to those on business and free Wi-Fi internet access is available in every room.

Varna International Airport Airport found

Probably the closest hotel to the airport this property offers rooms and suites with views across Varna Lake. It has a 180-seat Bulgarian restaurant and a large terrace for outdoor summer dining. In-room Wi-Fi is provided.
Located in Varna city centre Hotel Victoria offers basic business services such as fax and photocopying facilities and free internet. Studios and a variety of room types are offered.

Located 6km (3.7 miles) from Varna Airport near the city centre the Gran Ivan Hotel offers 3-star accommodation with a range of rooms apartments and suites. Car parking and in-room internet access are also available to guests.

Burgas Airport Airport found
A five-minute drive from Burgas Airport the Atlantis Resort complex offers a choice of bars and restaurants extensive spa facilities swimming pools and a range of conference and meetings spaces.
The Mirana Hotel which is located in the town of Sarafovo near Burgas Airport is a reasonably priced hotel with a pool full-service restaurant room service and internet access.

Within walking distance of the airport the Sea Horse is a smaller establishment with 15 rooms and several self-catering apartments available. The restaurant features an outdoor terrace and limited meeting facilities are available.

Situated in the centre of Sarafovo midway between the airport and the beach the Palma is another convenient small property suitable for those on a lower travel budget. It is close to local shops and restaurants.

Sofia Airport Airport found
The 62-room Triada offer two conference rooms and a business centre as well as a restaurant and bar. Airport transfers are available as is free internet access and a fully equipped fitness centre.

A 3-star hotel the small Hotel Consul is about 10 minutes by taxi from the airport. It offers a restaurant business centre and free internet access and is close to a bus stop.

Catania Fontanarossa Airport Airport found

Located in the heart of the city near the main bus stops for airport buses this bed and breakfast hotel is a good option for those on a limited budget. As well as generic hotel rooms there is also apartment-style accommodation. A discounted menu is available to guests of the hotel at a local restaurant.

Small but comfortable the 3-star Domus Hotel Catania couldn't be more central but it's still only 15 minutes from Catania Fontanarossa Airport and 15 minutes' walk from the railway station. This 17-room hotel offers room service and limited business facilities as well as a bar.

The boutique Il Principe Hotel is located in the historic heart of the city. It offers an American-style bar and wellness room with a Turkish bath along with a meeting room able to accommodate up to 70 delegates.

A grand hotel just 2km (1.2 miles) from Catania Fontanarossa Airport the Romano Palace Hotel boasts a luxury spa swimming pool and even its own dedicated beach area. Meeting and dining facilities are also located on-site.

Olbia Costa Smeralda Airport Airport found

A slightly less opulent option the Mercure nevertheless offers a good range of comforts including indoor pool with sauna restaurant and bar and meeting rooms for business purposes. It's located on the western fringe of the city but is still relatively close to the sea.

One of the few international branded hotels on the island the Doubletree is also located in the city centre close to the harbour. It features an outdoor pool and offers four meeting rooms along with a restaurant fitness centre and panoramic views from most rooms.

For those prefer local history to swanky modern hotels the La Locanda del Conte Mameli – a former home of nobility - is a terrific choice. Although classified as 3-star this small city hotel has eight rooms and suites and the breakfast room features genuine Roman relics.
A less pricey option the Hotel de Plam is situated in the heart of Olbia close to the harbour front. Its restaurant offers traditional Italian and Sardinian food and all rooms are air-conditioned.

Another 4-star option very close to the airport is the ultra-modern Jazz Hotel. This property caters for meetings and events and offers a gourmet restaurant open air swimming pool poolside cocktail bar and (last but not least) Turkish baths.

This large and elegant hotel is located in the city centre overlooking the new harbour. A range of rooms and suites is available some with balconies and the hotel has three conference/events rooms capable of seating up to 180 delegates.

Cagliari Elmas Airport Airport found
Located a short distance to the northwest of the airport Hotel Grillo is a luxury accommodation option with outdoor pool gourmet restaurant meeting facilities and multilingual staff.
The closest accommodation to the airport the 4-star Holday Inn offers a range of meeting rooms plus a business centre gym outdoor pool and sauna. There is a restaurant and cocktail bar.

Also within 4km (2.5 miles) of the airport the Sardegna Hotel has 84 rooms a restaurant serving classic Sardinian food and 24-hour reception. There is also a large conference centre at the hotel.

Bari Karol Wojtyła Airport Airport found

Housed in a restored 18th-century fortification the Hotel Palumbo is located to the north of the airport close to the coast. The traditional establishment has just 12 rooms but boasts a bar breakfast buffet beautiful ocean views and a large meeting room for business travellers. Airport transfers are available for a small supplement.

column1: Best Western La Baia Palace Hotel
column11: A very short drive or taxi ride from the airport the La Baia Palace is a 3-star hotel with 55 rooms plus meeting facilities. There is an outdoor pool and a roof garden restaurant offering coastal views and local specialties.

10 minutes drive from the airport Euromotel is a modern establishment some 5km (3 miles) from the city centre. It features a fine dining restaurant specialising in local seafood and an airport shuttle service is available.

Located just 50m (164ft) from the sea this hotel is a couple of kilometres (1.5 miles approx.) from the airport. It has a restaurant serving local and regional dishes a swimming pool and meeting rooms and is set in a garden with an ornamental lake.

The 231-room Parco dei Principi stands immediately outside the airport entrance. Facilities here include a large conference centre spa and fitness centre with pool two restaurants and extensive gardens.

Genova (Genoa) Cristoforo Colombo Airport Airport found

Opened in 2012 the Best Western is less than 3 km (2 miles) from the airport and comes with everything you'd expect from the popular hotel chain including a restaurant offering traditional Genoes food a fully-equipped gym (with hot tub) and business services.

column1: Tower Genova Airport Hotel and Conference Centre
column11: This large complex located close to the terminal is primarily aimed at business travellers but its proximity to the airport and useful facilities (including a gym climbing wall tennis court and on-site restaurant) makes it a good option for any traveller with an early morning flight to catch.

Also within a few minutes of the airport this hotel was a former stately home and has 88 rooms many of which overlook the sea. The restaurant specialises in Ligurian food and meeting facilities are available accommodating up to 150 delegates.
Close to Genoa's scenic port the Serafino is a smaller hotel with 40 rooms and is suited to those on a more restricted budget. The hotel allows pets and has a bar and internet connection.

The Hotel Castello Miramare is an excellent option for history buffs. The 3-star hotel is housed in a renovated ancient castle located close to the sea in the Pegli district just to the west of GOA. Breakfast lounge and bar are available as is Wi-Fi internet.

Trieste - Friuli Venezia Giulia Airport Airport found
Just 1km (0.6 mile) from the airport Hotel Furlan is a family run 3-star property with 54 rooms. The on-site restaurant with its rustic décor specialises in traditional local food and wines.

A little further from the airport and close to the main A4 motorway this modern hotel is of 4-star standard offering a choice of 96 rooms and suites. Two meeting rooms are available along with a business centre and restaurant.

In the centre of Monfalcone just a short drive from the airport this historic hotel has 40 rooms plus meeting facilities. It is housed in a converted workers' hostel dating from the 1920s and is convenient for the town's various restaurants and other local amenities.

Florence Airport Airport found

Just 1.6km (1 mile) from the terminal at Florence Airport this 4-star hotel offers free Wi-Fi internet access a 24-hour reception and a photocopying service. The property is located in a quiet residential area and is well connected to the city centre by public transport.

This 180-room hotel operates a shuttle service to and from the nearby airport and the city centre. Among the various facilities are meeting rooms an open-air pool and on-site dining. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available for guests.

Palermo Falcone-Borsellino Airport Airport found

A series of apartments located within close proximity to the coastline and the airport Case Vacanza offers guests a taste of traditional Italy with its meticulously restored rooms conventional decor and authentic setting.

Situated immediately outside the airport grounds this hotel is surrounded by parkland and is right on the coast with its own private beach. There is a large pool and a spa on site and it has extensive meetings and event facilities.

As its name suggests this large property is located on the coast. It features an outdoor terrace restaurant and caters for meetings and events. Most rooms come with balconies that overlook the sea.

Rome Ciampino Airport Airport found

A little further from Rome Ciampino Airport the 3-star Hotel Arcadia features a gym sun terrace and snack bar. A free shuttle service is available to the Anagnina Metro Station for connections into the city centre.

Hotel Giardino D'Europa is located near Anagnina Metro Station less than 4km (2.5 miles) from Rome Ciampino Airport. The hotel operates paid-for shuttle bus transfers to/from the airport from Monday to Saturday; it also has an on-site restaurant and a 50-seater meeting room.

Boasting an on-site restaurant swimming pool extensive conference facilities and tennis courts Petra Hotel & Residence is in nearby Anagnina. The hotel runs a free shuttle service (available on request) to the nearest metro station.

Hotel Villa Giulia is located in the centre of Ciampino just 3km (2 miles) from the airport. Rooms are air-conditioned and the hotel is a short distance from the local railway station providing good transport links.

Rome Leonardo da Vinci Fiumicino Airport Airport found

Just a short walk from the terminals via a moving walkway the Hilton offers on-site dining and meeting facilities. Other services include an indoor pool Jacuzzi gymnasium and a children's playground. Free shuttle buses operate from here to the centre of Rome.

Milan Linate Airport Airport found

Just 3km (2 miles) from the airport the Holiday Inn has a cocktail bar and a restaurant serving breakfast lunch and dinner. It also offers five small meeting rooms a complimentary airport shuttle service and a full-service business centre for those travelling for work.

Equipped with a 24-hour café bar outdoor pool and large outdoor terrace the 4-star Novotel operates a regular shuttle service to and from Milan Linate Airport which is 4km (2.5 miles) away. Like many hotels in the area meeting rooms are available to hire for business guests.

Located 5km (3 miles) from Milan Linate Airport the Crowne Plaza Milan Linate offers a free shuttle bus service to the airport. The hotel has two on-site restaurants fitness facilities and meeting and conference space for up to 1 200 people.

Also close to the terminal (about 10 minutes by car) the moderately priced NH Linate is located close to major businesses in the district. It offers meeting facilities a restaurant and a bar

Milan Malpensa Airport Airport found

Boasting conference facilities for up to 140 delegates as well as in-room Wi-Fi internet access a restaurant and bar the 4-star Crowne Plaza Milan-Malpensa Airport is located between Terminals 1 and 2.

column1: Holiday Inn Express Milan Malpensa Airport
column6: Via Francesco De Pinedo Ang. Via G. Oldrini
column11: Linked to the nearby airport by a free shuttle bus the 121-room Holiday Inn Express Milan Malpensa Airport is a good option for those on a budget. Parking spaces are available to guests while there is limited conference space for hire.
A basic budget option just a five-minute drive from Milan Malpensa Airport Airport Motel Malpensa provides car parking facilities a small meeting room bar and TV room.

Linked to the airport by a shuttle service First Hotel Malpensa is 1km (0.6 miles) from the terminals. The hotel features an on-site Italian-style restaurant and meeting space and is close to a number of golf courses.

This elegant hotel in verdant grounds is just 800m (0.5 miles) from Milan Malpensa Airport to which it is linked via an airport transfer service. Guests here can make use of the swimming pool and dine at the on-site restaurant which has a good selection of wines.

column1: Sheraton Milan Malpensa Hotel & Conference Centre
column11:
Located within Terminal 1 the Sheraton is a good option for those on business with a large range of services and meeting space. This chic hotel also has a range of leisure offerings including a restaurant indoor pool and fitness centre.

Bologna Guglielmo Marconi Airport Airport found

The FlyOn Bologna Hotel & Conference Center is located just outside the airport grounds. A complimentary shuttle service runs between the airport and the hotel every 15 minutes during the day. Meeting spaces are also available.

Located just 3.5km (2 miles) from Bologna Guglielmo Marconi Airport the 4-star Hotel Bologna Airport offers a range of accommodation types including day rooms for those on long layovers. Additional facilities include complimentary Wi-Fi access free parking and an on-site restaurant.

The 3-star Hotel Brianza is located just 1.2km (0.7 miles) from Bologna Guglielmo Marconi Airport. Facilities and offers at this well-priced hotel include a breakfast buffet complimentary Wi-Fi access and convention space for business travellers.

Venice Marco Polo Airport Airport found

Just 900m (984 yards) from Venice Marco Polo Airport Courtyard Venice Airport runs complimentary shuttles to and from the terminal. The hotel has meeting rooms and a fitness suite. Italian fare is served in the hotel’s Da Mario restaurant.

A little further from the airport (3km/2 miles) the luxurious Antony Hotel is a comfortable option offering regular shuttles to the terminal and the docks. Meeting rooms are available as is a restaurant.
Boasting a business centre bar and garden Hotel Venice Resort is in the nearby village of Tessera. Airport transfers are available on request.

column1: Best Western Hotel Titian Inn Venice Airport
column11: Linked to the nearby airport by a shuttle bus the Titian Inn offers 3-star accommodation and features a terrace and Wi-Fi internet access. There is no on-site restaurant; however the hotel serves a buffet breakfast and a pizzeria is located only a short walk from the hotel.

Set in pretty gardens a short distance from Venice Marco Polo Airport the 4-star Parkhotel Annia offers contemporary décor in traditional surrounds. A 24-hour airport transfer is available to guests who can also make use of the on-site restaurant free Wi-Fi access and complimentary parking.

Pisa International Airport Galileo Galilei Airport found

An opulent 5-star hotel this property is close to the Leaning Tower of Pisa and other attractions. It has an outdoor pool Turkish bath gymnasium and other spa facilities. Outdoor dining is available in summer and the hotel offers a number of meeting rooms.

Conveniently located adjacent to Pisa's main railway station this 4-star hotel is about as central as it's possible to be. The hotel has its own restaurant café and bars and a range of meetings facilities are available to guests.

Just five minutes from the airport (by car) this guesthouse is a short distance from the railway station and the old town attractions and is a good option if travelling on a budget. The rooms are attractively decorated and all are en-suite.

For those in search of Pisa's history this is a great choice – the atmospheric 3-star hotel is housed in the former home of wealthy silk merchants. This recently refurbished property is just 500m (1 640ft) from the Leaning Tower of Pisa and a short drive from the airport.

Verona Villafranca Airport Airport found

A 4-star rated property this hotel is very close to the airport and occupies a historic former monastery. It offers a fitness centre spa and a highly-rated restaurant. Conference facilities are also available.

Located within 2km (1.2 miles) of the airport the Hotel West Point is another top of the range offering. A paid-for airport shuttle is available along with fitness centre and pool restaurant and meeting facilities.

Offering a free shuttle service the Hotel Saccardi is a well-priced accommodation option situated on the main road that passes the airport. It features a large restaurant indoor and outdoor pools with sauna and a conference centre.

One of the closer accommodation options to the airport the AirportHotel Verona is a modern 4-star hotel offering a spa centre with pool restaurant conference and events space and a choice of rooms and suites. It also has a roof terrace.

A little further from the airport on the edge of the city centre this is a standard Ibis hotel close to the city's exhibition and congress complex. It has 145 rooms a restaurant and bar and all the usual Ibis services.

Another reasonably priced option close to the airport the Hotel Opera is a relatively new establishment in a restored early 19th-century building. It houses a small spa facility and restaurant with outdoor terrace serving light meals.

Naples International Airport Airport found

Just 10 minutes by road from Naples International Airport this high-rise hotel operates a regular complimentary shuttle bus to the terminals. In addition to its 18 meeting rooms guests can make use of the spa and enjoy live music in the piano bar most evenings.

Turin Caselle Airport Airport found

Within 1km (0.6 miles) of the airport in the town of Caselle this small property is a more economical option. All rooms are air-conditioned and guests can make use of the on-site restaurant and bar and meeting room.
Located a short distance from the airport by car the 4-star Quality Hotel houses a spa centre numerous meeting rooms and business facilities along with a restaurant and gym.

A short drive from the airport this hotel has 14 rooms and is housed in a charming 19th century building. There are some excellent restaurants located near to the hotel which itself offers a breakfast buffet coffee bar and well-tended grounds. Conference facilities are also available.

One of the closest accommodation options to the airport the 4-star Jet Hotel is housed in a historic building previously used as a printworks and nunnery. The hotel has a restaurant with outdoor terrace and also offers meeting rooms.

Located in a restored 18th-century farm complex this luxury property has 33 rooms and is situated in landscaped gardens. Regional cuisine is the theme of the elegant restaurant and the emphasis here is very much on comfort. A free taxi service to the airport is available.

Rhodes Diagoras International Airport Airport found

A larger hotel about 5km (3 miles) from the airport the Emerald is very much aimed at the leisure visitor. It offers a range of rooms apartments and studios all equipped with self-catering facilities; an on-site snack bar is also available with a nearby supermarket.

Just to the west of Rhodes town the Sheraton is a full-service international standard hotel complete with four restaurants two bars meeting facilities private beach and five outdoor and indoor swimming pools.

The small family-run Esmeralda Hotel in the village of Kremasti near Rhodes Diagoras International Airport houses studios and apartments a swimming pool bar and a restaurant. Wi-Fi internet access is available free for guests and it is about ten minutes' walk to the beach.

Corfu Ioannis Kapodistrias International Airport Airport found
Close to the southern end of the runway this is a 5-star beach resort with all the trimmings: conference and event facilities numerous restaurants and bars and spectacular views across the bay.

Conveniently located just 0.5km (0.3 miles) from Corfu Ioannis Kapodistrias International Airport the 45-room Hotel Bretagne offers a bar lounge and free Wi-Fi access. A sandy beach is also located within walking distance.

Set within landscaped gardens Ariti Hotel is located next to the airport. The hotel has two conference rooms a restaurant and meeting rooms. Those looking to relax can also make use of the swimming pool fitness room bar and lounge. A bus stop is located in front of the hotel providing good transport links.

A little further from the airport (about 5-10 minutes by car) the Arion is a beachside hotel. There is a café and the hotel which has 105 rooms is housed in a former British-built villa dating back to the 1830s.

Heraklion International Airport - Nikos Kazantzakis Airport found

Close to the new port area this economical option offers en-suite rooms free Wi-Fi access and a garden. Rooms have balconies with sea view and the local area is well populated with lively restaurants and bars.

Just 2km (1.2 miles) from the airport this 5-star property comes complete with conference facilities a health club and a choice of restaurants and bars. It has a health club with sauna and outdoor pool.
One of the nearest hotels to Heraklion International Airport the 3-star Sofia Hotel offers a pool poolside bar and a snack bar. Rooms are air-conditioned and Wi-Fi internet access is provided.

This is a large luxury hotel close to the airport offering extensive meetings facilities and indoor and outdoor pools. The hotel's on-site restaurant is also extremely popular serving up gourmet fare using fresh local ingredients.

Kos Island International Airport Airport found

A good option for families the Mastichari Bay Hotel is conveniently located just 6km (4 miles) from Kos Airport. As well as a large pool the hotel features a range of places to eat and drink and conference facilities for those who can't tear themselves away from work despite the stunning coastal scenery.

Around 15km (9 miles) from the airport Mitsis Summer Palace provides luxury accommodation in the form of rooms suites and bungalows near the town of Kardamena. A range of leisure activities including water sports is available to guests along with tasty cuisine in the on-site restaurant.

Mykonos Airport Airport found

One of the closest accommodation options Hotel Milena is situated within walking distance of the airport. Double and triple-occupancy rooms are available along with gardens a roof terrace snack bar and breakfast room.

Featuring contemporary interiors Ostraco Suites provides accommodation near Mykonos Town. The hotel offers an outdoor pool and outdoor barbecue facilities as well as a restaurant serving inventive Mediterranean cuisine.

Located close to central Mykonos and Mykonos Airport the Tharroe of Mykonos Hotel offers luxury accommodation with sea views. Hotel amenities include fitness facilities and on-site dining as well as an outside pool overlooking the sea.

A complex of four neighbouring buildings in Mykonos Town these properties share many facilities including swimming pools a spa treatment centre a restaurant and conference rooms. The complex is just 2km (1.2 miles) from the airport.

Chania International Airport Airport found

Located at the eastern end of Chania a 20-minute walk from the city centre Hotel Doma is one of the closest hotels to Chania International Airport. Housed in a restored 19th-century mansion the property offers sea views and period furnishings.

A short walk from the city centre Halepa Hotel offers a range of facilities including meeting space on-site dining and a roof garden with views of the city. The airport is just 15km (9.5 miles) to the east.

Roughly 12km (8 miles) from the airport this family-run accommodation option is served by buses from the city centre. The hotel is set in gardens and features indoor and outdoor dining plus an outdoor pool.

On the coastline to the north of the airport this is a resort for those seeking more luxurious accommodation while maintaining a convenient distance from the airport. A selection of bars and restaurants are present on site and the hotel boasts a pool with sea views.

Thessaloniki International Airport Airport found

The 2-star Heaven Hotel is one of the cheaper options in the area located some 10 km (6 miles) from the airport. The 40-room hotel features a large circular pool with terrace along with a large garden offering panoramic views of Thessaloniki. A breakfast buffet and snack bar are both available on site.
Close to the beach and still only 5km (3 miles) from the airport the Perea Hotel features an outdoor terrace bar and choice of single double or family-sized rooms.

The Ambassador Hotel is located just minutes from the airport terminal. In addition to its 50 rooms suites and chalets the hotel also boasts extensive meeting facilities an outdoor pool with bar and a restaurant overlooking the nearby bay.

Athens Eleftherios Venizelos International Airport Airport found

The striking yellow and silver Holiday Inn provides a free shuttle service to and from the airport which is less than 10 minutes away. This hotel houses a business centre indoor pool restaurant bar and gift shop and extensive meeting space is available for business guests.

A short distance south from the airport this small (15 rooms) hotel offers good quality budget accommodation in a quiet city suburb. The hotel's location also makes it a convenient choice for guests wishing to visit central Athens.

Boasting a spa conference facilities and a choice of restaurants and bars the Sofitel Athens Airport Hotel is in an ideal position next to the terminals at Athens Eleftherios Venizelos International Airport.

Tirana International Airport Nënë Tereza Airport found
Located immediately opposite the airport entrance Hotel Airport Tirana has 50 rooms including luxury suites along with a bar restaurant conference room and fitness centre.

This hotel's location just 1km (0.6 miles) from the airport and 3km (1.8 miles) from the historic city centre makes it a great choice for both holidaymakers and business travellers. The Hotel Aurelis houses a restaurant that serves traditional Albanian cuisine and Mediterranean specialities. Wi-Fi internet access is available.

Located conveniently close to the airport the Best Western Premier Ark Hotel is a modern property with two restaurants serving a choice of Albanian and international cuisine. It has a gymnasium spa and business centre along with meeting facilities and an airport shuttle service.

Zadar Airport Airport found

About 15 minutes drive west of the airport the Hotel Porto is a 3-star hotel that houses over 100 air-conditioned rooms and additionally offers meeting facilities to business travellers. Additionally the hotel features a restaurant and a private garden with a bar.

Located on the coast near the Dalmatia Marina complex the small and family-run Hotel Joso is another mid-range option. Its restaurant specialises in local produce and additional rooms are available in a recently opened annexe.

Dubrovnik Airport Airport found
Hotel Supetar is located near the beach in the town of Cavtat a short distance from Dubrovnik Airport. There is an on-site restaurant and spa facilities.

Situated near the town of Cavtat a 15-minute ride from Dubrovnik Airport the 3-star Smart Selection Epidaurus provides beachfront accommodation. Facilities include a range of leisure activities a restaurant and a beach bar.

Located 15 minutes from Dubrovnik Airport Hotel Croatia offers shuttle bus transfers to the airport. The hotel boasts on-site dining options a spa and meeting space.

Split Airport Airport found
Set in a prime location on the promenade of the UNESCO city of Trogir Island Hotel Concordia is located 5km (3.1 miles) from Split Airport. The historic hotel offers sea views and on-site dining.

Hotel Trogirski Dvori is a small family-run hotel situated only 1km (0.6 miles) from the centre of Trogir and 3km (2 miles) from Split airport. The traditional hotel is close to a beach and nature reserve and has an on-site restaurant.

column12: Located just 3km (2 miles) from the airport Hotel Sveti Kriz nestles on the small island of Čiovo. The beachside property has an open air pool a restaurant and spa facilities.

column11:
Hotel Kastel 1700 is located in the centre of Split. The hotel offers an airport pick-up service free Wi-Fi internet access and an on-site restaurant.

Zagreb Airport Airport found
The 43-room Best Western Hotel Stella is located near Zagreb Airport and offers business services and parking.
A stylish 4-star boutique-style hotel Hotel Pleso is just five minutes' walk across the park from Zagreb Airport. The hotel also houses event space a spa area and small but comfortable rooms.

This 44-room hotel provides comfortable accommodation meeting space and high-speed internet access. The hotel is on the main route from the airport to the city centre and is a short drive or taxi ride from the terminal.

Rotterdam The Hague Airport Airport found

Ibis Rotterdam Vlaardingen is a 15-minute drive from Rotterdam The Hague Airport. The hotel's facilities includes an on-site restaurant that offers dinner Monday to Friday a bar that is open all day all week and five meeting rooms with a maximum capacity of 80 people. Guests here will also appreciate the free on-site parking.

column1: Best Western Plus Rotterdam Airport Hotel
column11: The 4-star Best Western Plus Rotterdam Airport Hotel is within walking distance of the terminal building at Rotterdam The Hague Airport and is served by a free shuttle bus service. The hotel has 11 rooms for meetings and conferences that can accommodate up to 250 delegates as well as a restaurant with a wide-ranging menu.

Close to both the airport and the city centre the 105-room Bastion is a 4-star hotel offering a gym restaurant bar free parking 24-hour reception service and Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Nearby sights include Diergaarde Blijdorp Zoo and the Alexanderium Shopping Centre.

If a touch of luxury is required the Hilton is just a short trip from the airport in the city centre. This 5-star hotel is within walking distance of the city's major business locations and features two restaurants one of which boasts Michelin-star recognition.

Amsterdam Airport Schiphol Airport found
Mercure Schiphol Terminal Hotel is located within the terminal building beyond customs. The hotel offers shower facilities 24 hours a day as well as day rooms and overnight facilities.

The luxury option at the airport Hilton Amsterdam Airport Schiphol Hotel is a short walk through a covered walkway from the terminal. The hotel has a range of dining options and provides extensive business facilities as well as a foreign currency exchange.

column1: Sheraton Amsterdam Hotel and Conference Centre
column11: Boasting a restaurant café and bar the Sheraton is located within the airport site and has direct access to the departures and arrivals areas. Meeting space is available for those on business.
Located in the transit area of departure lounge 2 the Yotel provides modern small rooms (called ‘cabins’) at an affordable price. Free Wi-Fi is available for use by guests.

Offering modern boutique style rooms at the airport CitizenM Schiphol Amsterdam Airport houses a bar and café and is one of the more affordable options in the area.

Bergen Airport Airport found
The 4-star Thon Hotel provides a indoor pool fitness facilities and a restaurant with a buffet. There are also conference and meeting facilities.
A five-minute bus ride from Bergen Airport the 198-room Scandic Bergen Airport hotel houses business and meeting facilities a shop a fitness centre with a sauna a restaurant and a bar.

The Scandic Flesland Airport offers a free shuttle to the airport free Wi-Fi and a business centre. Breakfast is included in the price of the room and lunch and dinner is available at the Popolo Osteria & Bar.

The Clarion Hotel Bergen Airport is linked to Bergen Airport’s terminal building via a covered walkway. Amenities include free Wi-Fi internet access and extensive meeting facilities.

Stavanger Airport Airport found

Situated on the beach in nearby Sola this 139-bedroom hotel is just a short drive from the airport. It offers fine coastal views spa facilities a quality restaurant bar wine cellar and conference rooms.

Located a few minutes from the airport by car The Quality Airport Hotel offers spa facilities a complimentary breakfast free Wi-Fi and a shuttle to the airport. The hotel has a full-service restaurant bar and conference facilities.

Adjacent to the airport terminal this modern hotel has 189 rooms and a restaurant serving Norwegian cuisine. There is also a bar in the hotel lobby which serves snacks. Conference facilities are also available.

Oslo Airport Airport found

The Scandic is a more economical accommodation choice located within a 10-minute drive of Oslo Airport. The hotel has a bar a gym two restaurants and 22 meeting rooms. Parking and an airport shuttle are available for a fee.

column1: Park Inn by Radisson Oslo Airport
column11: Boasting meeting rooms and a fitness centre the 300-room Park Inn is easily reached from the terminal via a walkway. Peckish guests can make use of the on-site bar and grill restaurant while the terminal's eateries provide additional options.

More economical than the on-site options this property is just a couple of minutes by car from Oslo Airport. Conference rooms a gym and free Wi-Fi are available and the hotel boasts a restaurant and bar. Transport to and from the terminal is provided at regular intervals by the airport shuttle service.
Quality Hotel Gardermoen Airport is 5km (3 miles) from Oslo Airport and like most local hotels is served by a shuttle bus service. Facilities here include a restaurant and conference rooms.

A good choice for both business and leisure visitors with an early flight the 500-room Radisson Blu Airport Hotel Oslo is directly connected to the terminal building and provides the most luxurious accommodation in the area. The hotel has a choice of restaurants and bars a fitness centre and 31 meeting rooms accommodating up to 1 000 delegates.

The 432-room Clarion Hotel Oslo Airport houses a conference hall with space for up to 3 000 delegates and has a restaurant and fitness room. It is linked to the nearby airport by a shuttle bus service that departs from outside the terminal.

Sarajevo International Airport Airport found

Located immediately to the west of the airport the Hotel Hollywood is a huge complex with 400+ rooms 18 conference spaces and a wide choice of leisure facilities (including a swimming pool and large gym area) and dining options.

About 5 minutes from the airport by car this relatively small and basic hotel offers 36 rooms that are complemented by an outdoor terrace overlooking attractive gardens. The hotel also has an on-site tennis court.
100m (330ft) from the terminal this small boutique hotel has 22 rooms including two larger suites as well as other facilities include a meeting room on-site restaurant and fully stocked bar.

About 10 minutes by taxi from the airport Hotel Random Plaza is a 5-star hotel with 117 rooms and suites meeting and conference facilities and a fitness centre. The rooftop restaurant offers panoramic skyline views across Sarajevo.

Chisinau International Airport Airport found

The closest accommodation to the airport the 5-star Prezident offers a range of meeting rooms plus a business centre gym outdoor pool and sauna. There is also a selection of on-site restaurants and bars.

The Best Western Plus Flowers Hotel is a 4-star option on the southern edge of the city centre close to the main financial and historic areas. Like its competitors it too offers meeting facilities and a fitness centre while breakfast is included in the room rate.

Lviv Danylo Halitskyi International Airport Airport found

Close to Lviv's central railway station the Edem is a smaller mid-range hotel handy for the local sights. Airport transfers are available for a fee and the restaurant serves both Ukrainian and international cuisine.
Located in the centre of town the George is a luxury hotel housed in an elegant historic building. It boasts a gourmet restaurant with outdoor terrace along with several conference rooms.

Also close to the airport the Sputnik Hotel is a 4-star offering. It has a range of rooms and suites and also boasts multiple meeting rooms a business centre a beauty parlour a sauna and a restaurant. Wi-Fi access is included in the room rate.

One of the nearest full service hotels to the airport is about five minutes away by taxi. It is a mid-range hotel offering meeting facilities restaurant and bar. Free Wi-Fi is offered and staff members are multilingual.

Kiev Boryspil International Airport Airport found

The 32-room Four Seasons offers guests comfortable rooms sauna facilities and a conference space for business travellers all within 10 minutes drive from Kiev Boryspil International Airport. The restaurant menu includes local and international offerings and complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout.

A short distance from the airport the Ligena is an elegant and upmarket choice for those seeking a little more luxury. Its restaurant serves traditional Ukrainian dishes and the hotel also offers spa facilities a beauty salon and a conference space with room for up to 250 people.

Located between the terminals the Boryspil Hotel is operated by the airport authority and offers rooms by the hour as well as traditional overnight rates. Accommodation includes apartments a meeting room and a full service restaurant.

Dalaman Airport Airport found
Also within easy reach of the airport the 170-room Lykia Resort is a mid-range offering incorporating spa facilities conference and meeting rooms two restaurants and a choice of bars.

Located 4km (2.5 miles) from Dalaman Airport this 90-room property is close to the beach and features a spa with a wide range of treatments. There are four on-site restaurants and a choice of bars as well as meeting rooms for up to 100 people.

The closest hotel to Dalaman Airport the small and basic Hotel Burç has a swimming pool private beach children's playground and a restaurant serving local and international food.

Izmir Adnan Menderes Airport Airport found
A 20-minute drive from Izmir Adnan Menderes Airport the former Crowne Plaza Izmir houses a swimming pool business centre and restaurant. Free Wi-Fi internet access is provided.

Offering a range of dining and conference options Ege Palas Business Hotel is located towards the north of the city of Izmir near the port with some rooms providing views across the bay. It offers a fitness centre with sauna.
The Anemon Izmir Hotel is located 14km (9 miles) from Izmir Adnan Menderes Airport and provides private parking an on-site restaurant and meeting and conference facilities.

Overlooking the port and near the Old Town in Izmir the Hilton is 20 minutes from Izmir Adnan Menderes Airport. The hotel boasts a range of meeting rooms on-site dining and fitness and leisure facilities.

Located within walking distance of Izmir Adnan Menderes Airport Orty Airport Hotel offers on-site dining and meeting space. A free shuttle service is also available along with a breakfast buffet and a café.

Offering airport transfers and parking facilities the 5-star Swissotel boasts a range of business and leisure services including two restaurants a bar and a café spa and a selection of 19 meeting rooms of varying sizes.

Antalya Airport Airport found
Just 800m (0.5 miles) from Antalya Airport’s terminal buildings this hotel offers a spa squash court restaurant and conference facilities. It’s also only 10 minutes to Antalya city centre.

column12:
Occupying a prime spot on Turkey's Mediterranean coast Lara Hotel is situated 10km (6 miles) south of Antalya Airport. The beachfront hotel has 72 rooms most of which have panoramic views of the sea. On-site facilities include a swimming pool restaurant and Turkish baths.

Istanbul Airport Airport found

column11: https://www.yotel.com
column13: The YOTEL Istanbul Airport (Landside) is directly linked to the terminals at Istanbul Airport and features 277 rooms a gym free Wi-Fi meeting rooms and a bar and restaurant.

column11: https://www.yotel.com
column13: The YOTELAIR Istanbul Airport (Airside) is located inside the duty-free area after security and passport control and is the ideal choice for a long transit or a delayed flight. There are 174 rooms available as well as free Wi-Fi.

column11:
Just a 35-minute drive from Istanbul Airport Ramada Encore Istanbul Bayrampasa is located near the centre of Istanbul and boasts a fitness centre a bar a meeting room and room service.

Istanbul Sabiha Gökçen International Airport Airport found

The ISG Airport Hotel is available to both landside and airside transit passengers and is situated a couple of minutes' walk from the terminals. In addition to 128 rooms the hotel has a gym restaurant/bar and free Wi-Fi internet access.

Ankara Esenboga International Airport Airport found

This luxury 5-star hotel is the nearest to the airport. Facilities include thermal spa services two full-service restaurants and three bars including one by the open-air pool. The hotel also offers extensive meeting and conference facilities.

Around 5km (3 miles) from the airport the Esenboğa Airport Hotel is a 5-star luxury hotel. Rooms and meeting facilities are complemented by indoor and outdoor pools Turkish baths and a choice of on-site restaurants.

Minsk National Airport Airport found
Close to the main railway station this is a modern hotel convenient for shops and sightseeing attractions. Breakfast is included in the room rate and snacks are available 24 hours.

One of a few internationally branded hotels in Minsk the Crowne Plaza is centrally located and close to the main railway station. It features an indoor pool gymnasium and two restaurants along with meeting and conference rooms.

The 3-star Hotel Garni is a more economical option in the city centre. Housed in a historic building it has a business centre and meeting facilities. The restaurant offers both Belarusian and European cuisine.

Sochi International Airport Airport found

The 3-star SM Royal is a quirky hotel roughly 3.5km (2 miles) from Sochi International Airport. Along with an eye-grabbing décor the hotel offers a heated swimming pool Wi-Fi internet access and on-site parking. The hotel is also just a short stroll from the beach.

With its beachfront location near Adler the Lazur Beach Hotel is a convenient and alluring option for a stay near Sochi International Airport. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available along with a restaurant spa and gym. Some rooms also have balconies with lovely sea views.

Just 4km (2.5 miles) from Sochi International Airport the new Radisson Blu Resort & Congress Centre offers multiple dining options and a health club. The Congress Centre houses various meeting rooms and event space and is the best option for business facilities near the airport.

Irkutsk Airport Airport found

Situated opposite the Sib Expo Center this hotel is aimed at the business community but it also endeavours to attract leisure stays particularly at weekends. It has a good range of facilities including a fitness centre and travel agency.

Offering more Western-style accommodation the Sun is about halfway between the airport and the city centre. Free Wi-Fi is included in the room rate and rooms are en-suite. A full restaurant service is also offered.

Although primarily used by aircrew for their stopovers the hotel is within walking distance of the terminals and has recently re-branded itself as an option for general use. There is a luggage room hairdresser and travel agency on the premises.

Vladivostok Airport Airport found

This sleek and stylish Vladivostok city centre hotel boats free Wi-Fi conference rooms and a breakfast buffet. Rooms have views overlooking the city or coastline. The hotel is roughly 40 minutes from the airport by car.

The Villa Arte hotel with its beautiful European renaissance architecture is one of the hospitality jewels of the city. Located just outside Vladivostok town centre the drive from the airport takes approximately 10-15 minutes. Facilities at the hotel include an on-site restaurant a sauna and meeting rooms for guests travelling on business.

Located on the site of Vladivostok Airport Venice Hotel offers Wi-Fi internet access in all rooms. In addition to a restaurant offering Russian and international food there is a meeting room for use by business travellers.

Ekaterinburg Koltsovo Airport Airport found

The 4-star Angelo Airport Hotel has direct access to the terminal complex at Ekaterinburg Koltsovo Airport and offers a full range of services including conference and banqueting rooms a restaurant bar and fitness centre.

Samara Kurumoch International Airport Airport found

The 3-star Aviaotel is two minutes walk from the airport. It has 100 modern rooms a small restaurant gym and beauty salon. It also houses meeting and conference facilities for business travellers.

Strigino Nizhny Novgorod International Airport Airport found

Located just 3km (1.8 miles) from the airport the Russian Capital Hotel is a convenient option for those with an early flight to catch. Facilities at the hotel are pretty basic but include a 150 seat restaurant sauna with swimming pool and car wash.

The 64-room Nizhny Novogorod International Airport Hotel is located a short walk from the terminal building. It offers a range of room types at various prices and the rate includes a meal. The bar is open 24 hours.

St Petersburg Pulkovo Airport Airport found
Part of the AirportCity complex next to the airport the Crowne Plaza is linked to the terminals by a shuttle bus service. It boasts a health club restaurant and meeting rooms.

column1: The Park Inn by Radisson Pulkovskaya
column11: The Park Inn by Radisson Pulkovskaya hotel is located 5km (3 miles) from St Petersburg Pulkovo Airport and provides a free shuttle bus service to/from the airport and city centre. Facilities include a business centre fitness club meeting rooms and three restaurants.

Located in the heart of the city centre roughly a 30-minute drive from the airport the Hotel Astoria is an elegant hotel housing 83 rooms. On-site facilities include free Wi-Fi a restaurant meeting and business services and a spa with sauna and Turkish bath.

Moscow Sheremetyevo International Airport Airport found

Within walking distance of the airport the mid-range Park Inn Sheremetyevo Hotel provides free shuttle bus transfers to/from the terminals. The hotel features an on-site restaurant and bar free Wi-Fi internet access and a range of business services including two meeting rooms.

column12: Located opposite Terminals D E and F the Novotel Moscow Sheremetyevo Airport is linked by a free shuttle bus service to the airport. This 493-room hotel boasts a choice of meeting rooms and restaurants and provides guests with car parking facilities and a fitness centre with an indoor swimming pool.

column11:
Located within Sheremetyevo International Airport Radisson Blu Sheremetyevo has direct access to the terminals. The hotel has 391 rooms as well as a restaurant with terrace dining event space fitness centre and free internet.

Moscow Domodedovo International Airport Airport found

Boasting parking facilities a games room and a 24-hour business centre the Ramada Moscow Domodedovo is a short distance from the airport. A free hourly shuttle ferries guests to and from the terminals.

The Domodedovo Airhotel has 299 rooms of varying sizes and it is linked to the terminals by a regular shuttle service (despite being close to the terminals). The hotel additionally offers meeting rooms and other business and leisure services including a gymnasium restaurant and bar.

Moscow Vnukovo International Airport Airport found
Located just 4.8km (3 miles) from Moscow Vnukovo International Airport the Vnukovo Green Palace Hotel boasts a bar on-site dining room and free Wi-Fi in its spacious and clean rooms.

A modest price tag and extremely convenient location being situated just 2km (1.2 miles) from Moscow Vnukovo International Airport are the main draws at the Uninn guest house. Rooms are basic but comfortably furnished. There is a restaurant and business facilities available as is an airport shuttle service.

Located 8km (5 miles) from Moscow Vnukovo International Airport this 126-room modern business-style hotel offers conference rooms sports facilities free Wi-Fi internet access and an on-site restaurant.

Cluj Avram Iancu International Airport Airport found

The closest accommodation to the airport only has 10 available rooms but comes equipped with all the facilities you'd expect from a larger more modern hotel including an on-site restaurant conference room Wi-Fi access and airport transfers.

This is a 4-star option on the eastern edge of the city centre close to the main commercial districts of the city. It offers meeting facilities a fitness centre and spa with pool. Breakfast is included in the room rate.

Sibiu International Airport Airport found

Located in suburban Hipodrom the Best Western Silva is a 4-star hotel surrounded by green parkland that's within walking distance of the city's historic centre. Facilities include a restaurant and guest access to nearby sporting options such as hunting fishing cycling and horseback riding.

Situated in the heart of Sibiu city centre the Hilton provides guests with everything you'd expect from the global upmarket hotel chain including three restaurants a spa with indoor pool a stylish bar and major event facilities. A paid-for airport shuttle service is also available.

A little further towards the city centre the Hotel Select is another mid-range property. Aside from spacious and comfortable rooms the hotel also offers a choice of two restaurants cooking up local specialities and 'international' dishes as well as the additional extra of a room with a Jacuzzi bath.

A short distance from the airport the 3-star Ana Airport Hotel is a medium-sized property offering meeting facilities a restaurant and a bar. Free transfer to and from the airport is available for guests.

A short taxi ride from the airport the Golden Tulip is a 4-star offering located in the centre of town. It features a spa centre meeting rooms and a restaurant and there is a choice of room types including luxurious suites.

Timisoara Traian Vuia International Airport Airport found

Just on the other side of the city centre from the airport the Ambassador is a more upmarket offering than other hotels in the area. Its restaurant offers Romanian and international cuisine and amenities include meeting rooms and business services.
